Yeah, but what's the fucking point of making 720p with low bitrate?

white-hot - bit rate and file size are directly proportional.
Higher bit rate -> higher file size
Higher file size -> higher bit rate (generally speaking)
A bit rate of three quarters of a Mb is pathetic to be packaged in 720p format. Compare that to 4Mbps. https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6590732/Breaking_Bad_S04E04_Bullet_Points_720p_WEB-DL_DD5.1_H264-TB
